message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll see its value. I'm willing to start with a competitive price of $1200000.
I'm still very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I understand you're trying to meet me halfway, but I'm afraid I need to prioritize getting the best value for my investment. I'm willing to consider a compromise, but I need to make a bit more than $900000. I'm thinking of $1050000. This is my final offer for now.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product, and I think that's a fair price considering its value to me. Can you meet me at this price?
